feed.title: New BIP: protocol for multisignature payments

entry.title: New BIP: protocol for multisignature payments
entry.summary: A discussion regarding the importance of descriptive standards versus proscriptive ones took place in an email exchange on January 31, 2015. Gavin Andresen agreed with the sentiment that standards should be descriptive and not prescriptive. Mike Hearn added that it would be better to pair a protocol specification with an implementation. The original sender expressed gratitude for the feedback and promised to find time to implement it in the future.
